about_the_game:
You are a 13-year-old girl who has gotten into a sinister summoning game and now you will have to do everything possible to complete the game before Darla finds you, avoid at the cost of being seen or heard by Darla using the hiding places in the house while Complete the puzzle to finish the game.

Synopsis:

Dany is a pre-adolescent who has always been attracted to the paranormal challenges of the internet and in her quest to go even further, she ends up running into the game called "The game of hide and seek" which turns out to be the most terrifying experience of her life. , now she will have to survive the ritual she created with her doll named Darla and manage to survive all night before the being she summoned finds her and kills her.

> Don't stay long in hiding places
> Do not point the flashlight directly at Darla
> Don't turn on the lights
> Actions like running, opening drawers or doors can get Darla's attention

Characteristics:

> Immerse yourself in this first-person experience of horror and tension.

> Based on the internet creepypasta called “Hitori kakurenbo” that became popular in 2016 and now returns adapted to a video game and set in a common house in Mexico City.

> Performed and created by Mexicans.

> High quality soundtrack.

name: Te Encontré

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bits
  • Processor: AMD FX (tm) -6300 Six -Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 200 Series
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bits
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-6500 CPU @ 3.20GHz 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device

supported_languages:
English, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support
